problem_statement: The AI Maze Solver is designed to find a valid path from a start point to a goal within a maze. The maze may include obstacles, dead ends, and multiple possible paths. A test suite is required to verify correct maze interpretation and path generation. The tests ensure the solver avoids obstacles and handles edge cases correctly.
PASS_TO_PASS: Req 1: maze generation creates valid start position
Req 2: maze generation creates valid goal and boundaries
Req 3: BFS finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 4: DFS finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 5: A* finds valid path in solvable maze
Req 6: algorithms return empty path for unsolvable maze
Req 7: path has correct adjacency
Req 8: path cells are passable
Req 9: path starts at player and ends at goal
Req 10: player moves correctly in all directions
Req 11: player cannot move into walls
Req 12: player cannot move out of bounds
Req 13: reaching goal triggers win condition
Req 14: movement disabled when game is won or AI is solving
Req 15: player position always within bounds
Req 16: goal position always within bounds and passable
Req 17: complete game flow from maze generation to solving
Req 18: algorithm switching between BFS, DFS, and A* works correctly
Req 19: Jest framework is used with proper test structure
Meta: test suite quality and requirement coverage verified
